citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:05 pm on 27-
APRIL-2023. Inspector spoke to family member and called licensee who both stated that no one would be available for
inspection for a few hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 4:05 pm on 27-
APRIL-2023. Inspector spoke to family member and called licensee who both stated that no one would be available for 
inspection for a few hours. 
 
 
 
End Section
